About Us:


We, at NISER, Bhubaneshwar, work on developing new synthetic pathways for use in catalysis. We make bioluminescent and fluorescent compounds which have wide range application in industries as well as for medical services. We incorporate Boron in various compounds and find new alternative pathways for speeding up the reactions.

Chemistry requires patience, time, and diligence. Here are a few glimpses from our laboratory:










Join us if you want to explore Chemistry the way it should be done.

My group specializes in Inorganic, Organic and Polymer Chemistry. We focus on the developement of new synthetic routes for application in catalysis and materials chemistry.
